title: Four shot in west Charlotte, minor injuries
content:
CHARLOTTE, NC (WBTV) -
Charlotte Mecklenburg Police are investigating after they say four people were shot in West Charlotte early Saturday morning.
It happened around 5 a.m. on West Boulevard near Remount Road. Officials said three people were taken from the scene to an area hospital by ambulance. A fourth later showed up at the hospital with a gunshot wound.
Police tell WBTV all of the victims have non life-threatening injuries. Initially, one person was listed as having serious injuries but that status has since been downgraded.
No names have been released.
There is no word on the circumstances surrounding the shootings or any arrests.
